meanings.definition: Showing or suffering from nervousness, fear, or a lack of confidence.
meanings.sent1: Her timorousness nature made her hesitant to speak up in class.
meanings.sent2: The timid kitten's timorousness was evident as it cowered in the corner.
meanings.sent3: Despite her timorousness, she mustered the courage to ask a question during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The timorousness of the rabbit was akin to a leaf trembling in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The dark forest amplified her timorousness, causing her heart to race with fear.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being timid or fearful.
meanings.sent1: His timorousness was evident in the way he avoided eye contact.
meanings.sent2: The timorousness of the child was apparent as he clung to his mother's hand.
meanings.sent3: Despite his timorousness, he managed to stand up to the bully.
meanings.sent4: The timorousness in her voice betrayed her true feelings of anxiety.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house only heightened the timorousness of the visitors, making them jump at every sound.
